catalogItemType.name: Simple Instance
catalogItemType.instanceSpec:
{
  "group": {
      "id": "20",
      "name": "QA Docker"
  },
  "cloud": {
      "id": 8,
      "name": "QA Docker"
  },
  "type": "nginx",
  "name": "${userInitials}-${cloudCode}-${type}-simple-${sequence}",
  "config": {
      "createUser": true,
      "isEC2": false,
      "isVpcSelectable": true,
      "provisionServerId": null,
      "resourcePoolId": 160835,
      "poolProviderType": "docker"
  },
  "volumes": [
      {
          "index": 0,
          "rootVolume": true,
          "name": "data",
          "maxStorage": 1073741824,
          "volumeCustomizable": false,
          "hasDatastore": false,
          "readonlyName": false,
          "customMaxStorage": false,
          "size": 1
      }
  ],
  "hostName": "${userInitials}-${cloudCode}-${type}-simple-${sequence}",
  "layout": {
      "id": 7342,
      "code": "nginx-1.14-single"
  },
  "plan": {
      "id": 68,
      "code": "container-128"
  },
  "version": "1.9",
  "ports": [
      {
          "id": 59,
          "code": "nginx.80",
          "name": "Http",
          "shortName": "http",
          "internalPort": 80,
          "externalPort": 80,
          "loadBalancePort": null,
          "sortOrder": 0,
          "loadBalanceProtocol": "http",
          "loadBalance": true,
          "visible": true
      },
      {
          "id": 60,
          "code": "nginx.443",
          "name": "Https",
          "shortName": "https",
          "internalPort": 443,
          "externalPort": 443,
          "loadBalancePort": null,
          "sortOrder": 1,
          "loadBalanceProtocol": "https",
          "loadBalance": true,
          "visible": true
      }
  ],
  "networkInterfaces": [],
  "templateParameter": null,
  "backup": {
      "createBackup": true,
      "jobAction": "new",
      "jobRetentionCount": "3",
      "veeamManagedServer": "",
      "backupRepository": 1,
      "jobSchedule": 2,
      "target": 37006
  },
  "loadBalancer": [
      {
          "internalPort": 80,
          "externalPort": 80,
          "loadBalancePort": null,
          "loadBalanceProtocol": "http",
          "externalAddressCheck": false,
          "protocol": "http",
          "balanceMode": "leastconnections",
          "vipPort": 80,
          "vipHostname": "${userInitials}-${cloudCode}-${type}-simple-${sequence}.localdomain",
          "name": "${userInitials}-${cloudCode}-${type}-simple-${sequence}",
          "vipName": "${userInitials}-${cloudCode}-${type}-simple-${sequence}-load-balancer",
          "id": ""
      },
      {
          "internalPort": 443,
          "externalPort": 443,
          "loadBalancePort": null,
          "loadBalanceProtocol": "https",
          "externalAddressCheck": false,
          "protocol": "https",
          "balanceMode": "leastconnections",
          "vipPort": 443,
          "vipHostname": "${userInitials}-${cloudCode}-${type}-simple-${sequence}.localdomain",
          "name": "${userInitials}-${cloudCode}-${type}-simple-${sequence}",
          "vipName": "${userInitials}-${cloudCode}-${type}-simple-${sequence}-load-balancer",
          "id": ""
      }
  ],
  "hideLock": true,
  "deployment": {
      "id": 1,
      "versionId": 7
  },
  "showScale": false,
  "volumesDisplay": [
      {
          "storage": null,
          "name": "data",
          "controller": null,
          "datastore": null,
          "displayOrder": null,
          "size": 1,
          "mountPoint": null
      }
  ]
}
catalogItemType.content:
# Nginx Container
This is a sample catalog item that provisions a single nginx docker container.
Enjoy!
